statements: DELETE FROM delivery_metrics WHERE vendor_id = 101 AND delivery_time > 30;
DELETE FROM vendor_contacts WHERE vendor_id = 201 AND contact_phone LIKE '%1234%';

DELETE FROM delivery_times WHERE vendor_id = 3 AND delivery_duration > 60;

DELETE FROM quality_scores WHERE vendor_id = 201 AND date_recorded < '2021-01-01';
